headline: Is It Worth Investing in Ross Stores (ROST) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Ross Stores (ROST) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
